abstracts.cdata!:
The Secondary and Feeder Roads Project
            consists of the construction, rehabilitation or improvement
            of about 10,000 km of secondary and feeder roads linking
            agricultural areas to federal and state primary highway
            networks, and the construction of penetration roads into
            areas of good agricultural prospects. It will include
            consulting services for engineering studies and supervision.
